text: Marco Cavicchioli (born 31 January 1969 in Biella) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Biella on 8 June 2014 and took his office on 10 June. Cavicchioli ran for a second term at the 2019 Italian local elections, but he was not re-elected. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Biella ==External links== * * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Biella Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Marco Cavicchioli
